definition: to be fondly attached to/to not wish to part with/to cling to
to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: Nirodha extinguishes all forms of clinging and attachment.
sentences.chinese: 滅消滅一切形式的執着和依戀。

sentences.english: And the attachment to the country mainly manifests in patriotic like family.
sentences.chinese: 對國家的依戀集中體現在愛國如家心態上。

sentences.english: Forsaking all I've fallen for, I rise to meet the end.
sentences.chinese: 拋棄那些我曾依戀的一切，我往上迎向我的盡頭。

sentences.english: Readers of all ages retain a remarkable emotional attachment to the thing.
sentences.chinese: 各個年齡段的讀者難以割捨對紙質圖書的這份依戀。

sentences.english: I am attached to every tree and bush in my hometown.
sentences.chinese: 我依戀故鄉的一草一木。

sentences.english: In 1689 his mother, to whom he was deeply attached, died.
sentences.chinese: 1689年，他所深深依戀的母親去世了。

sentences.english: Last autumn leaves lie in the chancellorship in Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 德國，柏林，依戀在爬牆虎上的最後幾片紅葉。

sentences.english: With the dreams and attachings of the youth. look forward to the fruitage of love.
sentences.chinese: 青春的夢想與依戀，期待愛情的果實。

sentences.english: The science of attachment is based on the fact that we are all biologically programmed to find love.
sentences.chinese: 依戀理論的根據是人們按照生物學設定的程序尋找愛。

sentences.english: How much tenderness may stay, and how much sentimental attachment may accompany?
sentences.chinese: 有多少溫存可以常留，有多少依戀能夠相隨？

sentences.english: He is too root-bound to consider moving to another state.
sentences.chinese: 他太依戀故土，從未考慮過要搬遷到別的州去。

sentences.english: Attaching mother is when you can't see she , you'll feeled very empty and dismayed .
sentences.chinese: 依戀母親，是在你看不到她時內心無比的空虛和慌張。

sentences.english: This is a sign of an overly-sensitive attachment system.
sentences.chinese: 以上這些都是過度敏感的依戀系統的信號。

sentences.english: I am immersing the happiness of being loved. I find it more and more profoud for me.
sentences.chinese: 沉浸在被愛着的幸福裏，越來越依戀這樣的感覺了。

sentences.english: The Attachment System. This is friendship on hyperdrive.
sentences.chinese: 依戀體系，也就是友誼的昇華。

sentences.english: Lady with the attachment to send it away, full of longing Jinniu usher.
sentences.chinese: 帶着依戀送走銀鼠，滿懷憧憬迎來金牛。

definition: to worry about/to be concerned about
to fall short of/to have a deficit/deficit/deficiency
the moth flies into the flame/fatal attraction
partner (in four person game)/family of proposed marriage partner
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
